message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 by us due to its unique features and benefits. I am confident it will bring significant value to your endeavors. Would you like to proceed with this exclusive opportunity?

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm a bit constrained by my budget, and I'm not sure if the product is worth the full $15000. Can you consider a lower price?
